components/reviews/review-item:
{{!-- Product Review Item An individual customer review as displayed on products. --}}

{{title}}

{{> components/reviews/ratings rating=rating size=true}} {{rating}}/5
{{{text}}}
{{lang 'product.reviews.posted_by_on' name=name date=date}}
components/reviews/review-modal:
{{! Leave a review }}
{{> svg/modal-close}}

{{lang 'product.reviews.write_review'}}

{{#if product.reviews.throttleToken}} {{/if}} {{!-- Clickable Stars --}}
{{lang 'product.reviews.rating_label'}}
{{!-- Name --}}
{{!-- Email --}}
{{!-- Subject --}}
{{!-- Comments --}}
{{!-- Captcha --}} {{#if product.reviews.captcha}} {{> core/forms/common/captcha captcha=product.reviews.captcha name=recaptcha_response_field}} {{/if}}
core/alerts/alert-error:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
core/alerts/alert-success:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
